title: flake8 >= 3.8.0 causes "F541 f-string is missing placeholders" error during style checking.
body:
**Describe the bug**

flake8==3.8.1 (and 3.8.0) has been released on 5/11.
https://pypi.org/project/flake8/#history

An issue has been reported (https://gitlab.com/pycqa/flake8/-/issues/648), but this seems to be the expected behavior of flake8 >= 3.8.0.
> As of flake8 >= 3.8.0, pyflakes got bumped to >= 2.2.0, which has added a new check that will flag F541.
https://gitlab.com/pycqa/flake8/-/issues/648

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Upgrade flake8 to 3.8.X
2. Execute `make check`

**Expected behavior**

Check runs without an error.

**Error Logs/Screenshots**

```
$ make check
isort -rc -c src/
Skipped 1 files
isort -rc -c tests/
black src/ --check
All done! ‚ú® üç∞ ‚ú®
88 files would be left unchanged.
black tests/ --check
All done! ‚ú® üç∞ ‚ú®
27 files would be left unchanged.
flake8 src/
src/fonduer/utils/utils_parser.py:24:24: F541 f-string is missing placeholders
1     F541 f-string is missing placeholders
1
make: *** [check] Error 1
```

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - Fonduer Version: latest commit on the master branch (8e321ce8518090e3dd7e863e204f9fad0988a1be).

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
